main event: A housewife and two marines observed a white, glowing light, about the size of a basketball, with erratic motion at Brooklyn Navy Yard in 1955.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be traveling at a speed of 170 miles per hour with jerky, erratic motion.
Both civilian and military sources reported the sighting.
The conclusion categorized the object as a possible balloon, astronomical, or other phenomena.
The observation took place at the Brooklyn Navy Yard in New York.
